statements: DELETE FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE audit_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE user_id = 100 AND check_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE user_id = 456 AND check_timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM biometric_payments WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100
DELETE FROM audit_records WHERE user_id = 200 AND date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type = 'Background Check';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_action = 'delete' AND audit_date < '2022-01-01';
